meanings.definition: Having a lot of money; wealthy
meanings.sent1: The monied man bought a fancy car.
meanings.sent2: She admired the monied family's luxurious lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The monied neighbor always throws extravagant parties.
meanings.sent4: In the land of the monied, even the smallest things are grand.
meanings.sent5: His monied status was evident in his opulent mansion.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to wealth or money
meanings.sent1: The monied elite controlled the economy.
meanings.sent2: The company's success attracted monied investors.
meanings.sent3: The monied class had a lavish taste in art.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry collection reflected her monied background.
meanings.sent5: The monied district gleamed with prosperity.
